categories.title: Number Theory
categories.preview: Problems involving primes, modular arithmetic, divisibility, and Diophantine equations.

categories.title: Algebra
categories.preview: Problems in linear and abstract algebra, including groups, rings, fields, and polynomial identities.

categories.title: Geometry
categories.preview: Problems in Euclidean and coordinate geometry, constructions, loci, and transformations.

categories.title: Real Analysis
categories.preview: Problems involving limits, sequences, continuity, differentiability, and integrability.

categories.title: Complex Analysis
categories.preview: Problems involving holomorphic functions, residues, conformal mappings, and contour integration.

categories.title: Combinatorics
categories.preview: Problems in counting, permutations, pigeonhole principle, inclusion-exclusion, and graph theory.

categories.title: Mathematical Logic
categories.preview: Problems involving logical reasoning, formal systems, and foundational paradoxes.

categories.title: Differential Equations
categories.preview: Problems solving ODEs, systems of equations, and applications in modeling and physics.

categories.title: Mechanics (Theoretical Physics)
categories.preview: Problems in classical mechanics including Newtonian systems, conservation laws, and Lagrangian dynamics based on Landau-Lifshitz Volume 1.

categories.title: Lagrangian Formalism
categories.preview: Problems involving variational principles, Euler-Lagrange equations, constraints, and generalized coordinates.

categories.title: Hamiltonian Formalism

categories.title: Rigid Body Dynamics
categories.preview: Problems involving rotation, inertia tensors, angular momentum, and torque in rigid systems.

categories.title: Variational Calculus
categories.preview: Problems exploring functionals, constraints, and the principles of least action.

categories.title: LeetCode
categories.preview: Algorithm and data structure problems from LeetCode, organized by difficulty and topic.

categories.title: HackerRank
categories.preview: Coding and mathematics problems from HackerRank challenges across domains.

categories.title: Codewars
categories.preview: Coding kata problems from Codewars emphasizing brevity and elegant solutions.

categories.title: AtCoder
categories.preview: Advanced competitive programming problems from AtCoder contests, with a focus on speed and precision.
